Summary: Watched a shere traveling horizonal towards my son and me then shoot straight up until out of sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn July 4th 2011 my son and I were walking my dog at 10:00 at night. My son asked me "what is that "? I said I don't know but it is coming right at us. We both witnessed a sparkling sphere traveling from the North going due South. I can best describe the sphere as omitting multi colors as would a sparkler used by small children on the 4th. We watched the sphere stop and shoot straight up to the heavens. The speed resembled the reverse of a shooting star. I'm not an expert on aviation, but I am a retired engineer. I do understand G-Force. No living thing of this earth could withstand that type of force. My son was really upset at what he had seen. I was lucky enough to see a saucer type UFO in the sixties. I was aware of the existence.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Winchester
There were no other sightings in Winchester on or around July 4th 2011
